type.description: Type of losgistics object, e.g. air waybill, booking, etc

typeCode.description: Commonly useed codes for document type, e.g. jfwb, jfhl etc. Leave nlank if unknown

issuedBy.description: Internet of logistics identity code of issuing party.

key.description: JSON field name of code that identifies this logistics object, e.g. 'waybill number', 'UPID' etc.

SecurityStatusDate.description: Date and time when the Security Status was issued

RegulatedEntity.description: Company and person details issuing the security status - e.g. with COMPANY SecurityClassifcication as RA - Regulated Agent, KC - Known Consignor or AO - Authorized Operator / Account Consignor

ReceivedFrom.description: Known Consignor or Account Consignor reference

ScreeningMethod.description: Screening methods which have been used to secure the cargo - e.g. VCK

OtherScreeningMethods.description: Other methods used to secure the cargo

AdditionalSecurityInformation.description: Ad hoc security statement required by state regulators
